item.title: HTMLDOC 1.8.26
item.description: HTMLDOC 1.8.26 improves table formatting and PostScript and PDF output. It also fixes a first page header bug in the GUI.
item.dc:creator: mike
item.dc:subject: News

item.title: HTMLDOC 1.8.25
item.description: HTMLDOC 1.8.25 adds new fonts, improves header support, and improves CGI support on Windows. It also fixes a number of rendering issues.
item.dc:creator: mike
item.dc:subject: News
